body_html:
there's a preprocessing, hipify step where you need to run
python tools/amd_build/build_pytorch_amd.py and make sure you have the python files at https://github.com/ROCm-Developer-Tools/pyHIPIFY copied over to /opt/rocm/bin. Not sure if you need to chmod +x hipify-python.py for build_pytorch_amd.py to work, but I did it anyway. Now I'm on to the next issue, problems with operator overloading using the Half data type.
#9219

body:
there's a preprocessing, hipify step where you need to run 
`python tools/amd_build/build_pytorch_amd.py` and make sure you have the python files at https://github.com/ROCm-Developer-Tools/pyHIPIFY copied over to `/opt/rocm/bin`. Not sure if you need to `chmod +x hipify-python.py` for `build_pytorch_amd.py` to work, but I did it anyway. Now I'm on to the next issue, problems with operator overloading using the `Half` data type.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/9219
